column4: Okay I read the RootSudo thing on the Wiki.  So I make a root password.  and the want to make it back the way it was...I just do "sudo passwd -l root"?  and then it's back to the default Ubuntu freaky root thingy?
sudp passwd -d will make it the way it was
okay...so I think you need to change the wiki
passwd -l disable it -d delete the pwd.. man passwd
